name: Custom Browser Automation Agent
description: A powerful custom browser automation agent with multi-provider LLM fallback (Cerebras â†’ Groq â†’ NVIDIA), vision capabilities (Ollama â†’ NVIDIA), and live screenshot streaming. Can navigate websites, interact with elements, extract information, save images from web pages, and stream real-time browser activity to the canvas.

endpoints.description: Drive a live browser session: navigate URLs, click/type, submit forms, extract structured data, and stream screenshots to the canvas for oversight.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The task description for the browser agent (e.g., 'Go to leetcode.com/contest and find upcoming contests').

parameters.name: max_steps
parameters.description: Maximum number of steps to execute (default: 10).

parameters.name: extract_data
parameters.description: Whether to extract structured data from the page (default: False).
